snippet: The Giants running game struggled in the season-opening loss to the Cowboys with Ahmad Bradshaw rushing for 78 of the team’s total 82 yards on the ground.
abstract: Sam Borden On Pro Football column holds that the New York Giants running game has miles to go, and suggests that they should rely more on passing.
lead_paragraph: The Giants running game struggled in the season-opening loss to the Cowboys with Ahmad Bradshaw rushing for 78 of the team’s total 82 yards on the ground.

headline.seo: Giants’ Run Game Has Miles to Go
headline.main: Giants’ Run Game Has Miles to Go
headline.print_headline: Giants’ Run Game Has Miles to Go
